column1: #text=For a school assignment I needed to find a book from the library .
#text=I went to the library after class and looked the book up on the computer which had the library 's catalogue .
#text=The book was upstairs , so I went there and followed the call numbers until I found what I was looking for .
#text=I then went back downstairs to the circulation desk .
#text=I placed the book on the counter and the friendly librarian swiped my library card and then scanned the book .
#text=Turns out I owed a fine which I had to pay before I could have the book .
#text=It was only a dime which thankfully I had on my person .
#text=After paying the fine the book was stamped with a due date and the librarian gave it to me .
#text=It was raining out so she gave me a rain bag to protect the book .
